  Life...Hmmm....

I have no idea what to type or write about. Which is funny because Usually I have too much to say, usually I Point out someone and talk shit to them but right now my life has kind of just froze and im starting to look at shit and realize that I will Eventually, whether it be today,tommorow, or even 80 years from now, I will Loose everybody I know. All of my friends,my family.
I will be Old and tired and I will look back at pictures of me and my friends and think to myself "I WAS so young" And i will look at pictures of Me and my mom and think "Im so sorry, for making you misreable" Im starting to wonder how Old people Cope with themselves, with their sick twisted old bodies and the aging all over. And Seeing Every Fucking Person You Love Die and thinking about the possibilty  of NEVER being able to see them again. Its Crazy The Mental Torture one has to endure never knowing what you are going to do when you are old, and you cant just sit down and talk to your mom, or call up your best friend and just see what hes doing.Because they are all gone and so is your heart. Up until yesterday Everyday I would count the days until I was 18 now I just count the days until Im Alone, Scared, Sad, old.....

Ryan-Aint Life Grand!
